articles.author: Oscar Godsell
articles.title: WA Health announces three cases of meningococcal disease, one death and two hospitalisations - Sky News Australia
articles.description: Western Australia’s Department of Health has confirmed three cases of the deadly meningococcal disease in the state on Thursday.
articles.content:
Western Australia’s Department of Health has confirmed three cases of the deadly meningococcal disease in the state on Thursday.
Tragically, one individual has died of the illness while the two othe… [+1707 chars]
